Our paper CMAB: A Multi-Attribute Building Dataset of China was published in Scientific Data (ESI Highly Cited Paper).
Received "Rising Star" Award (Ten Young Scholars in GIS) at The 13th China College GIS Forum.
Our paper WaveC2R: Wavelet-driven Coarse-to-refined Hierarchical Learning for Radar Retrieval was accepted at AAAI-25.
Nominated for "Academic Rising Star" at Tsinghua University (Top 0.1%).
Our paper Inferring Ghost Cities on the Globe in Newly Developed Urban Areas based on Urban Vitality with Multi-source Data was published in Habitat International.
Released Global Ghost City Index (GloGCI) dataset.
Presented at Applied Urban Modelling (AUM2024) at University of Cambridge, UK.
Our paper on global urbanization (Rethinking the Country-level Percentage of Population Residing in Urban Area with a Global Harmonized Urban Definition) was published in iScience.
Released Global Harmonized Urban Definition (GloPPRUA) dataset.
Presented at Global Smart Cities Summit (GSCS) in Hong Kong.
